report.name: facons2an

dataSource.name: Q_Facons2
dataSource.select: select br.codbr dc_codbr, dir.coddir dc_coddir, br.libbr dc_libbr, dir.libdir dc_libdir, s.sigdep||'/'||s.sigpole dc_libpole, TO_CHAR(r.codsg, 'FM0000000') dc_codsg, f.socfact dc_socfact, r.rnom dc_rnom, r.ident dc_ident, to_char(r.lmoisprest,'mm/yyyy') dc_lmoisprest, TO_CHAR(f.codsg, 'FM0000000') dc_factcodsg, f.numfact dc_numfact, f.typfact dc_typfact, f.codcompta dc_codcompta, f.montht dc_lmonth, f.numcont||f.cav dc_contrat, r.conso_total dc_cousag, r.cout dc_cout, r.montant_mensuel dc_montant_mens FROM faccons_ressource r, faccons_facture f, struct_info s, directions dir, branches br, datdebex d WHERE r.ident=f.ident and r.lmoisprest=f.lmoisprest and r.codsg=s.codsg and s.coddir=dir.coddir and dir.codbr=br.codbr and (ABS((r.cout*r.conso_total)-r.fact_total)<=1 OR ABS((r.montant_mensuel)-r.fact_total)<=1 ) &P_where ORDER BY br.codbr ASC, dir.coddir ASC, dc_codsg ASC, dc_socfact ASC, dc_rnom ASC, dc_ident ASC, dc_lmoisprest ASC, dc_lmonth DESC, dc_numfact ASC

dataSource.name: Q_mois
dataSource.select: SELECT DECODE(:p_param7, 'N', datdebex, ADD_MONTHS(datdebex,-12)) dc_annee, --TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(moismens,-1),'YEAR') dc_annee) moismens dc_mois from datdebex
